revised_title: Advancements in Animal Biotechnology: Genetic Manipulation and Enhanced Animal Production
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in animal biotechnology, focusing on genetic manipulation and enhanced animal production. It explores the use of recombinant DNA methods to engineer protein gene products for administration to livestock, as well as advanced breeding technologies like embryo transfer and cloning. The article also highlights the potential benefits and challenges of these technologies in improving animal production and addressing concerns about animal welfare, social, and environmental implications.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Animal Biotechnology
